choices.text:
### System:
You are an AI assistant that follows instruction extremely well. Help as much as you can.

### User:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company

### Response:


Subject: Resignation Email
Dear [Boss's Name],
I hope this message finds you well. 

As of today, I will be resigning from my position at [Company Name]. It has been a great experience working for the company and I have learned so much during my time here. However, it is now time to pursue new opportunities that align better with my career goals.

I would like to thank you for all of your support throughout my tenure at [Company Name] and wish everyone the best moving forward. If there is anything I can do to help make this transition smoother, please don't hesitate to reach out. 

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
